Control.name: combodyn_value_autocomplete
Control.label: Autocomplete
Control.choices: {SELECT fruit FROM reference_fruit500 where @[SELF.filter] is null OR fruit like @[SELF.filter]||'%' ORDER BY fruit LIMIT 20}

Control.name: Full_Name
Control.label: Full Name:
Control.reference: SELECT surname || ' ' || first_name || ' ' || middle_name || ' - ' || biometric_pin AS name FROM Reference_mg_biometric_data WHERE name LIKE '%' || @1 || '%' GROUP BY name ORDER BY name

Control.name: Full_Name_Autocomplete
Control.label: Full Name:
Control.reference: SELECT surname || ' ' || first_name || ' ' || middle_name || ' - ' || biometric_pin AS name FROM Reference_mg_biometric_data WHERE name LIKE '%' || @1 || '%' GROUP BY name ORDER BY name

Control.name: Driver_Fltr
Control.label: Search for driver (min. 4 chars)
Control.reference: SELECT driver_name FROM Reference_mg_vehicle WHERE vehicle_no = @1

Control.name: Driver_Name_Combo_sf
Control.label: *Driver Name:
Control.reference: SELECT 'add_new' AS driver, 'Add new' AS driver_name UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT driver, driver_name FROM Reference_mg_vehicle WHERE driver IS NOT NULL AND driver != '' AND driver_name LIKE '%' || @1 || '%' AND LENGTH( @1 ) > 3 ORDER BY driver_name
Control.value_reference: SELECT driver_name FROM Reference_mg_vehicle WHERE vehicle_no = @1
